price: But she was hindered [from the faith] because she used to worship other than Allah, for she came from a disbelieving people.
arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ
